ground_truth: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope looks out over an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her. In a flashback, she steps out of her knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog does what he's told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the washroom key, which he hands to her. In the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the lavatory seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the clerk, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly forlorn. Juno slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose, bites into the liquorish rope, and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color washing from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heart-shaped face, and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bike and rides off, leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing Elk School, parks her bike, and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students, most of them taller than her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Underneath a overcast sky, a single-story cottage perched on a mild incline gazes out over an irregular grass. An adolescent girl with short chestnut hair tied back in a small ponytail drinks from a small synthetic bottle as she considers an armchair standing on the grass in front of her. In a recollection, she steps out of her underwear and walks slowly across the room toward a thin boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a hesitant smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a gentle kiss. The shaggy blonde canine does what he's commanded. The girl takes a drink of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the bathroom key, which he hands to her. In the bathroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the toilet seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a brief look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of candies onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the cashier, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly dejected. Juno slings a rope of candy onto the limb of a tree and makes a loop, bites into the licorice rope, and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, and unclothed dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a vehicle. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow athletic kit. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A group of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color draining from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heart-shaped face, and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bicycle and rides off, leaving Bleeker holding his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing Elk School, parks her bicycle, and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming crowd of students, most of them taller than her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope is looked out over by an uneven lawn. A small plastic bottle is swigged from by a teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail as an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her is contemplated by her. In a flashback, her knickers are stepped out of, and she walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Just a T-shirt is worn by her as she straddles the boy's lap, and a tentative smile is given by her as her rosebud lips are brought close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog is told what to do by him. A swig of juice is taken by the girl, and her mouth is wiped on the sleeve of her hoodie. A pregnancy kit is picked up by her, then the washroom key is reached for, and he hands it to her. In the washroom, her jeans are unzipped by her, and she sits down on the lavatory seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. The stick is pulled out by her, given a cursory look, then she hurries back through the store towards the counter, where a pack of sweets is slapped onto it by her as she gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the clerk, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly forlorn. Juno slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose, bites into the liquorish rope, and wanders off home. The light switch doubles as a doll's penis in bedrooms, and naked dolls cluster on the mantelpiece. Bleeker is shown playing his guitar in a photo. A number is dialed by Juno on her hamburger-shaped phone, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. A note is handed to Juno by Bleeker, and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. The armchair on his front lawn is sat in by Juno. A posse of runners in brown and yellow pass by on a rug. Her eyes are lowered by Juno as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color washing from his pale cheeks. Bleeker swallows, and Juno blinks happily. A thin smile is flashed across her heart-shaped face, and a pipe is cut between her teeth. Her bike is mounted by her and ridden off, leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Dancing Elk School is cycled up to by Juno, her bike is parked, and it is secured with a chain lock by her. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students, most of whom are taller than her, reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Under cloudy skies, a low-rise bungalow on a gentle slope overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied in a ponytail drinks from a small bottle, eyeing an armchair on the lawn. Flashback: she sheds her knickers and walks toward a skinny boy in the armchair, wearing just a T-shirt. Smiling, she kisses him. The shaggy blond dog obeys commands. She sips juice, wipes her mouth on her hoodie, picks up a pregnancy kit, and takes the washroom key. In the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits on the toilet, and uses the kit. She checks the result and hurries to the counter, placing a pack of sweets while looking at the test. Shaking it, she rolls her eyes at the clerk, leaves forlorn, and makes a candy rope noose on a tree branch, then heads home. Bedrooms feature light switches as doll parts, with naked dolls on the mantelpiece and Bleeker's guitar photo. Juno calls on her hamburger phone; a girl with a rabbit on her chest answers. They load the armchair into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, and she beams; he's in his sports kit. Juno sits on the lawn armchair. Runners pass, and Juno looks down as Bleeker's eyes cross under his sweatband, cheeks pale. Juno smiles thinly, bites a pipe, rides off leaving Bleeker with his sandwich. Juno cycles to Dancing Elk School, parks, and locks her bike, then navigates through taller students to her locker.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Beneath cloudy skies, a bungalow overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair drinks from a plastic bottle while eyeing an armchair on the lawn. In a flashback, wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles a bare-chested boy, smiles, and kisses him. The girl takes a swig of juice, wipes her mouth on her hoodie, picks up a pregnancy kit, and heads to the washroom. She unzips her jeans, uses the kit, checks the result quickly, and rushes back to the counter to buy sweets, then leaves, appearing forlorn. Juno hangs candy on a tree, bites it, and goes home. Bedrooms feature unique decorations, and a photo of Bleeker with his guitar. Juno calls a friend using her hamburger phone. They load the armchair into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, making her beam, and wears a sports kit. Juno sits in the armchair on the lawn as runners pass by. She smiles at Bleeker, then rides her bike to Dancing Elk School, locks it, and heads to her locker amidst taller students.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Underneath a sky thickly laden with clouds, a modest, low-rise bungalow sits quietly perched upon a gentle, rolling slope, its view extending over a somewhat uneven and ragged lawn. A teenage girl, youthful in appearance, with short, brown hair neatly tied back into a small, tidy ponytail, takes a hearty swig from a small plastic bottle as she thoughtfully regards an armchair situated on the grassy lawn in front of her. In a vivid flashback, she is seen stepping out of her knickers, making her way slowly and deliberately across the room toward a rather skinny boy who sits bare-chested in that same armchair. Clad in nothing more than a simple T-shirt, she carefully straddles the boy's lap, offering a tentative smile as she gently brings her rosebud-shaped lips close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy, blond dog obediently follows instructions. The girl takes another swig of her juice and wipes her mouth clean with the sleeve of her hoodie. She then picks up a pregnancy test kit, reaching for the washroom key, which he promptly hands to her. Inside the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the toilet seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, takes out a slim, paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a quick glance, then hurries back through the bustling store toward the counter, where she places a pack of sweets with a slight slap and gazes at the test in her hand. She gives it a shake, rolls her eyes at the clerk behind the counter, and exits the store with the stick still in hand, her expression turning suddenly forlorn. Juno, with a playful air, drapes a long rope of candy onto the branch of a tree, fashioning it into a makeshift noose, bites into the licorice rope, and wanders off toward home. The bedrooms are quirky, with the light switch serving double duty as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are grouped together on the mantelpiece. A photograph of Bleeker playing his guitar is prominently displayed. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, and elsewhere, a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit resting on her chest picks up. They manage to maneuver the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note, and she beams with delight. Bleeker is decked out in his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno makes herself comfortable in the armchair situated on his front lawn. A group of runners, clad in brown and yellow, passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her gaze as Bleeker's eyes meet hers beneath his yellow sweatband, with the color draining from his already pale cheeks. Juno blinks joyfully as Bleeker swallows nervously. A thin smile flickers across her heart-shaped face, and she bites into a piece of pipe between her teeth. She mounts her bike and rides away, leaving Bleeker standing there with his sandwich in hand. Juno cycles up to the entrance of Dancing Elk School, parks her bike securely, and locks it with a sturdy chain lock. She navigates her way through the oncoming wave of students, most of whom are taller than she is, finally reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Beneath a sky heavily laden with gray, billowing clouds, a modest bungalow of simple, low-rise design sits quietly and unassumingly perched atop a gentle, rolling slope. From its vantage point, the view stretches over a somewhat uneven and ragged patch of lawn, giving the scene a rather rustic charm. A teenage girl, possessing a youthful appearance, with her short, brown hair neatly tied back into a small, tidy ponytail, takes a hearty swig from a small plastic bottle as she thoughtfully regards an armchair positioned on the grassy lawn in front of her. In an evocative and vivid flashback, she is seen stepping out of her knickers, moving slowly and deliberately across the room toward a rather skinny boy who sits bare-chested in that same armchair. Clad in nothing more than a simple T-shirt, she carefully straddles the boy's lap, offering a tentative, shy smile as she gently brings her rosebud-shaped lips close to his face, silencing his mouth with a tender, lingering kiss. Meanwhile, a shaggy, blond dog obediently follows their instructions, adding to the scene's quaint atmosphere. The girl takes yet another swig of her juice, wipes her mouth clean with the sleeve of her hoodie, and picks up a pregnancy test kit, reaching out for the washroom key, which he promptly hands to her. Once inside the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the toilet seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, and takes out the slim, paddle-shaped stick, putting it into position. She pulls the stick out and gives it a quick, furtive glance, then hurries back through the bustling store toward the counter, where she places a pack of sweets with a slight slap and gazes intently at the test in her hand. She gives it a shake, rolls her eyes at the clerk behind the counter, and exits the store with the stick still in hand, her expression turning suddenly forlorn. With a playful air, Juno drapes a long, colorful rope of candy onto the branch of a tree, fashioning it into a makeshift noose, then bites into the licorice rope and leisurely wanders off toward her home. The bedrooms in the house are quirky in design, with the light switch ingeniously serving double duty as a doll's penis, and naked dolls are amusingly grouped together on the mantelpiece. A prominently displayed photograph captures Bleeker playing his guitar. Juno then dials a number on her whimsical, hamburger-shaped phone, and elsewhere, a girl lying comfortably on her bed with a rabbit resting on her chest picks up the call. Together, they manage to maneuver the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note, and she beams with delight, her face lighting up with happiness. Bleeker is decked out in his distinctive brown and yellow sports kit. Juno makes herself comfortable in the armchair situated on his front lawn. A group of runners, all clad in matching brown and yellow attire, passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her gaze as Bleeker's eyes meet hers beneath his yellow sweatband, with the color visibly draining from his already pale cheeks. Juno blinks joyfully, while Bleeker swallows nervously. A thin smile flickers across her heart-shaped face, and she bites into a piece of pipe between her teeth. She mounts her bike and rides away, leaving Bleeker standing there with his sandwich in hand. Juno cycles up to the entrance of Dancing Elk School, parks her bike securely, and locks it with a sturdy chain lock. She carefully navigates her way through the oncoming wave of students, most of whom are noticeably taller than she is, finally reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope offers an unobstructed view of the uneven lawn stretching out before it. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail lifts a small plastic bottle to her lips, taking a swig as she stands absorbed in contemplation of an armchair situated on the lawn in front of her. Suddenly, a flashback takes her to a moment where she steps out of her knickers and moves with measured, deliberate steps across the room towards a skinny boy who sits bare-chested in the same armchair. Clad only in a T-shirt, she confidently straddles the boy's lap, her face breaking into a tentative smile. She gently leans forward, her rosebud lips inching closer to his face until they softly connect with his mouth, stopping it in a tender kiss. Meanwhile, a shaggy blond dog attentively responds to commands, performing as expected. The girl, back in the present, takes another swig of juice, then casually wipes her mouth with the sleeve of her hoodie. With determination, she picks up a pregnancy kit and reaches for the washroom key, which is promptly handed to her by someone nearby. Once in the washroom, she carefully unzips her jeans, lowers herself onto the lavatory seat, and methodically opens the pregnancy detection kit, extracting a narrow paddle-shaped stick and positioning it with precision. After using the stick, she gives it a cursory glance and then hastily makes her way back through the store towards the counter. There, she emphatically slaps a pack of sweets onto it while gazing intently at the test. She gives the test a shake, rolls her eyes at the clerk with a mix of exasperation and disbelief, and exits the store, clutching the stick with a suddenly forlorn expression. The girl, identified as Juno, playfully slings a rope of candy over a tree branch, forming a makeshift noose, takes a playful bite into the licorice rope, and eventually meanders off towards her home. In Juno’s bedroom, unique décor includes a light switch that doubles as a doll's penis and an assortment of naked dolls clustered together on the mantelpiece, alongside a photo capturing Bleeker mid-guitar strum. With intent concentration, Juno dials a number on her quirky hamburger-shaped phone, initiating a call to a girl lounging on her bed with a rabbit comfortably resting on her chest. Together, they take up the armchair, maneuvering to shove it into the backseat of a car. Bleeker, with a shy demeanor, hands Juno a note that immediately lights up her expression into a beaming smile. Clad in his brown and yellow sports kit, Bleeker stands nearby as Juno situates herself comfortably in the armchair on his front lawn. A lively posse of runners decked out in brown and yellow sports attire passes by on a rug, creating a brief yet colorful spectacle. Juno lowers her eyes thoughtfully as Bleeker looks back at her, his eyes darting beneath the bright yellow of his sweatband, the color gradually draining from his pale cheeks. With a blink of contentment, Juno acknowledges Bleeker, who visibly swallows, while a subtle smile flickers across her heart-shaped face. With a playful gesture, she cuts a pipe between her teeth, then mounts her bike and confidently rides away, leaving Bleeker behind, still clutching his sandwich. Juno pedals her way up to Dancing Elk School, methodically parks her bike, and secures it with a chain lock, before weaving through the oncoming throng of students, most towering over her, until she finally arrives at her locker.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description:
Under a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow overlooks an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair, tied back in a ponytail, drinks from a small plastic bottle while contemplating an armchair on the lawn. In a flashback, she removes her knickers and approaches a skinny boy, seated bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles his lap, smiling tentatively before kissing him tenderly. Afterward, she drinks juice, wipes her mouth on her hoodie sleeve, picks up a pregnancy kit, and takes the washroom key from him. Inside the washroom, she tests for pregnancy and briefly checks the result. Hurrying back through the store, she slaps a pack of sweets onto the counter while gazing at the test, then shakes it and exits, her expression suddenly forlorn. 

Juno uses a candy rope to make a noose on a tree branch, bites into it, and heads home. Her bedroom features a light switch resembling a doll's penis and naked dolls on the mantelpiece, along with a photo of Bleeker playing guitar. She dials a friend on her hamburger-shaped phone, and they converse. Later, they move the armchair into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, and she beams. Bleeker, wearing his sports kit, watches as Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A group of runners in brown and yellow passes by. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's gaze, beneath his yellow sweatband, crosses hers, causing a thin smile on her face. She bites a pipe between her teeth, then rides off on her bike, leaving Bleeker holding his sandwich. Juno cycles to Dancing Elk School, parks her bike, locks it with a chain, and navigates through the taller students to reach her locker.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky, a low-rise bungalow perched on a gentle slope, typical of suburban houses in the Pacific Northwest known for their sprawling lawns, looks out over an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle of apple juice, a popular convenience store choice, as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her, a relic from an eclectic yard sale. In a flashback, she steps out of her knickers, discarding them with the nonchalance often seen in teenage impulsivity, and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting bare-chested in the same armchair. Wearing just a T-shirt, she straddles the boy's lap, giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips, a vivid crimson shade that stands in stark contrast to her pale complexion, close to his face, stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog, a loyal companion and often the silent witness to her teenage escapades, does what he's told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her well-worn hoodie, a favorite garment that offers comfort in its familiar fabric. She picks up a pregnancy kit, then reaches for the washroom key, which he hands to her with a solemn understanding of the gravity of the situation. In the washroom, she unzips her jeans, sits down on the lavatory seat, opens the pregnancy detection kit, a brand known for its reliability, brings out a narrow paddle-shaped stick, and puts it into position. She pulls out the stick and gives it a cursory look, then hurries back through the store towards the counter where she slaps a pack of sweets onto it and gazes at the test. She shakes it, rolls her eyes at the clerk, a sympathetic figure who often sees such teenage dramas unfold, and leaves the store, stick in hand, her expression suddenly forlorn at the weight of its implications. Juno, known for her quirky humor, slings a rope of candy onto the branch of a tree and makes a noose, bites into the liquorish rope, and wanders off home. Bedrooms have the light switch doubling as a doll's penis, a manifestation of the household's eccentricity, and naked dolls are clustered on the mantelpiece, a collection that has grown over the years. There's a photo of Bleeker playing his guitar, a hobby that offers him solace. Juno dials a number on her hamburger-shaped phone, an item that perfectly encapsulates her whimsical nature, and a girl lying on her bed with a rabbit on her chest, a comforting pet during times of stress, answers. They take up the armchair, shoving it into the back of a car that has seen better days. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams, touched by his heartfelt gesture. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit, the colors of Dancing Elk High School that he's proud to represent. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug, participating in a practice session for the upcoming track meet. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband, the color washing from his pale cheeks as he realizes the significance of their conversation. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows, understanding their unspoken connection. A thin smile flashes across her heart-shaped face, and she cuts a pipe between her teeth, a habit she picked up in her more rebellious phases. She gets on her bike, a gift from her father for her last birthday, and rides off, leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich, a hastily made meal before practice. Juno cycles up to Dancing Elk School, a place she finds both stifling and freeing, parks her bike, and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students, most of them taller than her and laden with the trappings of teenage life, reaching her locker.

On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. answers. They take up the armchair shoving it into the back of a car. Bleeker hands Juno a note and she beams. Bleeker wears his brown and yellow sports kit. Juno sits in the armchair on his front lawn. A posse of runners in brown and yellow passes by on a rug. Juno lowers her eyes as Bleeker's eyes cross beneath his yellow sweatband the color washing from his pale cheeks. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heartshaped face and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bike and rides off leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing El. k. School parks her bike and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students most of them taller than her reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Beneath a cloudy sky a lowrise bungalow perched on a gentle slope looks out over an uneven lawn. A teenage girl with short brown hair tied back in a small ponytail swigs from a small plastic bottle as she contemplates an armchair standing on the lawn in front of her. In a flashback she steps out of her knickers and walks slowly across the room toward a skinny boy sitting barechested in the same armchair. Wearing just a Tshirt she straddles the boy's lap giving a tentative smile as she brings her rosebud lips close to his face stopping his mouth with a tender kiss. The shaggy blond dog does what he is told. The girl takes a swig of juice and wipes her mouth on the sleeve of her hoodie. She picks up a pregnancy kit then reaches for the washroom key which he hands to her. Juno blinks happily as Bleeker swallows. A thin smile flashes across her heartshaped face and she cuts a pipe between her teeth. She gets on her bike and rides off leaving Bleeker clutching his sandwich. Juno cycles up to Dancing El. k. School parks her bike and secures it with a chain lock. She makes her way past the oncoming throng of students most of them taller than her reaching her locker.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Under a starry night, a towering lighthouse slouches on a rugged cliffside gazing out over a sparse desert. An elderly man with long gray hair braided into a sizable bun gulps from a large glass pitcher as he examines a rocking chair sitting in the desert next to him. In a dream sequence, he removes his sandals and tiptoes briskly across the garden toward a plump woman reclining fully clothed in the same rocking chair. Clad only in overalls, he sits on the woman’s lap, showing a timid grin as he brings his chapped knuckles near her forehead, halting her nose with a gentle touch. The scruffy white cat ignores what's asked. The man takes a sip of lemonade and brushes his chin on the collar of his jacket. He grabs a lottery ticket, then reaches for the cash register receipt, which she hands to him. In the kitchen, he unbuttons his shirt, lowers himself onto the wooden stool, unseals the lottery results booklet, extracts a wide card-shaped leaflet, and flips it into view. He flips over the leaflet and gives it a hasty glance, then rushes back through the kitchen towards the sink where he slams a stack of dishes onto it and stares at the results. He spins it, shrugs at the cook, and exits the kitchen, leaflet in hand, his demeanor suddenly jubilant. Marvin tosses a strand of spaghetti onto the edge of a table and forms a loop, chomps into the spaghetti strand, and strolls off to bed. Basements have the light bulb doubling as a teddy bear's ear, and clothed teddy bears are scattered on the bookshelf. There's a portrait of Nelson juggling oranges. Marvin presses digits on his owl-shaped calculator, and a boy sitting on a couch with a squirrel on his shoulder responds. They hoist the rocking chair, wedging it into the trunk of a van. Nelson gives Marvin a pencil and he grins. Nelson wears his red and white marching uniform. Marvin lounges in the rocking chair on his back porch. A group of skaters in red and white speeds by on a carpet. Marvin raises his eyebrows as Nelson's eyebrows tighten above his white headband, the shade draining from his rosy cheeks. Marvin winks contentedly as Nelson gulps. A wide grin sweeps across his diamond-shaped chin, and he snaps a twig between his fingers. He jumps on his scooter and glides away, leaving Nelson munching his apple. Marvin scoots up to Orange Elk College, parks his scooter, and fastens it with a rope lock. He weaves his path past the approaching crowd of teachers, most of them shorter than him, reaching his drawer.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Under a cloudy sky, a teenage girl with short brown hair contemplates an armchair on her lawn. In a flashback, she kisses a bare-chested boy sitting in the same armchair. After swigging juice, she takes a pregnancy test, glances at the result, and leaves the store looking forlorn. Juno creates a noose from licorice, eats it, and goes home. Her room is cluttered with naked dolls, and a photo shows Bleeker playing guitar. Juno calls a girl with a rabbit on her chest. They take the armchair and load it into a car. Bleeker gives Juno a note, making her smile. Wearing his sports kit, Bleeker exchanges glances with Juno as runners pass by. Juno rides her bike to Dancing Elk School, locks it, and navigates through taller students to reach her locker.
